item.title: TME
item.description: score:83 Chances: Tencent Music Entertainment Group has defied expectations with its strong profit growth despite a slight revenue dip, demonstrating strategic agility in offsetting mixed results in its social media business and regulatory challenges. The company’s growth in paid subscriptions has helped it gather almost as many paid subscribers as both Spotify Technology S.
